translation.en: Let's make that money.
translation.ja: さあ 稼(かせ)ぐぞ

translation.en: What have you guys been eating?
translation.ja: 何を食ったんだ？

translation.en: Score!
translation.ja: いただき

translation.en: Shh!
translation.ja: 止まれ

translation.en: Gah… this isn't what it looks like. I'm only here for your poop.
translation.ja: 誤解だよ欲しいのはウンチだけ

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, I'm here for the mushrooms in your poop.
translation.ja: ウンチの中のキノコだ

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound any better.
translation.ja: 話してもムダか

translation.en: Catch!
translation.ja: ほらよ

translation.en: Sorry I can't stay for dinner.
translation.ja: 夕食にはならない

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.ja: マズい

translation.en: Come on, who throws somebody at somebody?
translation.ja: おい 味方を投げるなよ

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.ja: 〝ニューヨーク市下水道〞

translation.en: Large rats.
translation.ja: 大ネズミ

translation.en: Dirty hands, filthy rich.
translation.ja: 手を汚(よご)しても もうけるぞ

translation.en: Hurry up, man. I can't do business until you deliver the goods.
translation.ja: 〝ホットドッグ〞 急いでくれブツがないと商売にならん

translation.en: Tyson, you're in for a treat, you lucky wizard.
translation.ja: 〝ホットドッグ〞 タイソン　あんたは運のいい魔法(まほう)使いだ タイソン　あんたは運のいい魔法(まほう)使いだ

translation.en: Freshly tracked.
translation.ja: 新鮮(しんせん)だよ

translation.en: Ah, it better be.
translation.ja: 当然だろ

translation.en: My dupe spell is useless without multiplying mushrooms.
translation.ja: コピー魔法(まほう)には増殖(ぞうしょく)キノコが欠かせない

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the good stuff right there.
translation.ja: こいつを待ってた

translation.en: Hurry up, man. You don't wanna get busted for doing magic in public.
translation.ja: 急げ　魔法(まほう)を見られたら逮捕(たいほ)されるぞ

translation.en: One more second.
translation.ja: すぐに終わる

translation.en: All right! Double your pleasure.
translation.ja: お楽しみが倍増した

translation.en: You, get to Tribeca. You, Soho.
translation.ja: 手分けして売ってこい

translation.en: And get my money back before you disappear this time!
translation.ja: 今回は消える前にカネを届けろよ

translation.en: Oh, look at this little guy.
translation.ja: ちっこいのが出たぞ

translation.en: How's about a mini-dog, Spellbound? On the house.
translation.ja: ミニドッグだ　食うか？

translation.en: Uh… I don't eat magic.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)のものは食べない

translation.en: You may be half-sized, but you charge full price. You hear me?
translation.ja: 体は小さくても値引きはするなよ いいな

translation.en: Getting partners was the best business decision I ever made.
translation.ja: 仲間を持ったのはベストな判断だった

translation.en: You got someone watching your back, kid?
translation.ja: お前に仲間は？

translation.en: Ha! You volunteering?
translation.ja: あんたがなる？

translation.en: Nah, I'm not trying to buddy up with somebody on the wrong side of The Pie Maker.
translation.ja: イヤだね　お前はパイメイカーとモメてる

translation.en: Who cares about that old witch?
translation.ja: ただの老いぼれ魔女(まじょ)だ

translation.en: Her bakers are searching for you, kid. She wants you that bad,
translation.ja: 彼女(かのじょ)の手下がお前を捜(さが)してる

translation.en: you must've really screwed up tracking something for her.
translation.ja: アイテムの捜索(そうさく)で怒(おこ)らせたな

translation.en: It's fine. I'm close to finding a Fugu Rose.
translation.ja: 平気さ　フグ･ローズを手に入れる

translation.en: Whoa. That rose is worth serious money, kid. You found one?
translation.ja: とんでもなく高価なバラだ見つけたのか？

translation.en: I just need help to track the last step.
translation.ja: 最後に助っ人が必要なんだ

translation.en: Once I get that, ha! All my debts are cleared and I'm set.
translation.ja: それさえ見つかれば借金を完済できる

translation.en: Yeah, except you'll still be stinky, friendless, and, oh yeah, not magic.
translation.ja: それでも お前はクサいし友達がいなくて魔力(まりょく)もない

translation.en: Hygiene's a scam, friends are a scam, and, oh yeah, magic is a scam.
translation.ja: クサくてもいいし友情も魔法(まほう)も まやかしだ

translation.en: Call it what you want, kid, but my magic buddies are making me rich.
translation.ja: 何とでも言え俺(おれ)は魔法(まほう)で もうけてる

translation.en: Oh!
translation.ja: ヤバい

translation.en: Hey-hey, guys. I was just on my way to see you--
translation.ja: やあ どうも今 会いにいこうと…

translation.en: Hey, where were you?
translation.ja: おい 何してた

translation.en: You see that little hot dog guy down the block? You have to try one of his dogs.
translation.ja: 近くの屋台で売ってるホットドッグがうまいんだ

translation.en: -[grunts] -[baker] We searched. No magic on him.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)アイテムは持ってません

translation.en: Daniel, my boy.
translation.ja: 私のダニエル

translation.en: I always forget how cute your place is, Pie Maker.
translation.ja: 今日もキュートな店だねパイメイカー

translation.en: The pies, the… curtains,
translation.ja: パイも カーテンも

translation.en: the cyclops henchmen.
translation.ja: 巨人(きょじん)の手下も

translation.en: I didn't become the most wicked witch of New York by having low-life spell Trackers fail me.
translation.ja: 能無しトラッカーのせいで私は危険な魔女(まじょ)になれない

translation.en: My clients expect the best magical ingredients. Ingredients you were supposed to deliver.
translation.ja: パイに使う魔法(まほう)の材料を調達するのが お前の仕事

translation.en: Where are my gnome whiskers?
translation.ja: ノームのヒゲはどこ？

translation.en: I was gonna get them to you, I swear!
translation.ja: 探しにいったんだ

translation.en: But the Bureau sicced a dowser on me, I had to ditch 'em. I have a plan.
translation.ja: でも魔法(まほう)警察にジャマされた別案がある

translation.en: The magic world knows my pies have the most dangerous ingredients.
translation.ja: 私のパイは危険な材料で知られてる

translation.en: Ingredients you promised to find me and failed.
translation.ja: お前は その材料を約束し失敗した

translation.en: That's fair, but I'm tracking something big for you.
translation.ja: だから もっと大物を追う

translation.en: Yes, for me, because you owe me.
translation.ja: ええ そうして 借金を返すまでお前は私のトラッカーよ

translation.en: You're my Tracker now.
translation.ja: 借金を返すまでお前は私のトラッカーよ

translation.en: You will do nothing
translation.ja: お前の仕事は

translation.en: but find every little illegal ingredient I need for my magic pies.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)のパイに入れる違法(いほう)な材料を探すこと

translation.en: I told you, the Bureau heat on me has been intense,
translation.ja: でも魔法(まほう)警察に追われてる

translation.en: but when I can track again, I'll make it up to you. It's all about you.
translation.ja: 状況(じょうきょう)が落ち着いたら探しにいく

translation.en: Uh-uh-uh. You're not telling me the truth.
translation.ja: あらあら ウソをついてるわ

translation.en: I haven't done any tracking at all, I swear.
translation.ja: 他の取引はしてない

translation.en: Bring out…
translation.ja: 連れてきて

translation.en: …The Beast.
translation.ja: 野獣(やじゅう)を

translation.en: Ah… a pig?
translation.ja: ブタ？

translation.en: Hey! Come on.
translation.ja: おい やめろ

translation.en: [giggling] Get this thing off of me.
translation.ja: やめろよ

translation.en: It tickles, but in a scary way.
translation.ja: くすぐったいし 何だか怖(こわ)い

translation.en: [Pie Maker] Don't struggle.
translation.ja: 動かないで

translation.en: The pig sniffer is powerful enough to sense any magic from a hundred yards away.
translation.ja: そのブタは優れた嗅覚(きゅうかく)で遠くの魔法(まほう)もかぎ分ける

translation.en: Hey, what the--
translation.ja: どうして…

translation.en: Ogre mushrooms. Fresh.
translation.ja: オーガのキノコねしかも新鮮(しんせん)

translation.en: Impressive work.
translation.ja: 見事な腕前(うでまえ)よ

translation.en: Get his eye-patch ready.
translation.ja: 眼帯を用意して！

translation.en: This isn't necessary!
translation.ja: その必要はない

translation.en: Now, which are you, Daniel?
translation.ja: お前にぴったりなのは

translation.en: A heart? Oh, no, no, no.
translation.ja: ハート？ いいえ　違(ちが)う

translation.en: You clearly think you're a star.
translation.ja: お前が好きそうなのは スターだ

translation.en: I could get you a Fugu Rose!
translation.ja: フグ･ローズを渡(わた)す

translation.en: Impossible.
translation.ja: 無理よ

translation.en: No one's seen a Fugu Rose in years. They're priceless.
translation.ja: 何年も見た者がいないとても貴重なバラだ

translation.en: I know where one is.
translation.ja: 在りかは分かる

translation.en: My best Trackers couldn't do that. No way you could, silly boy.
translation.ja: 一流のトラッカーでも見つけられなかった

translation.en: Give me 24 hours and it's yours, if you erase all my debt.
translation.ja: 24時間で渡(わた)すから借金を帳消しにして

translation.en: Well, dear, we have a deal.
translation.ja: いいわ　交渉(こうしょう)成立よ

translation.en: [Pie Maker] You better not disappoint me again,
translation.ja: 二度と失望させないで

translation.en: because you won't like what this spell will do to you.
translation.ja: この魔法(まほう)は楽しくないわよ

translation.en: Not one bit.
translation.ja: これっぽっちもね

translation.en: Great. Heh. You'll be seeing me soon.
translation.ja: よかった　では後ほど

translation.en: There is still the little matter of you lying to me, though.
translation.ja: 私にウソをついた問題がまだ残ってる

translation.en: -Wait! We have a deal. -[Pie Maker chuckles evilly]
translation.ja: 待って　交渉(こうしょう)は済んだ あらまあ

translation.en: My dear,
translation.ja: あらまあ

translation.en: you can still find the Rose with one eye.
translation.ja: 片目になってもフグ･ローズは探せる

translation.en: No! That activates the oven to full power.
translation.ja: ダメ！ オーブンが全開になる

translation.en: Turn off the oven, you buffoon!
translation.ja: オーブンを消して

translation.en: Ha! What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何してるの

translation.en: [Daniel] You're just the kind of help I've been looking for.
translation.ja: 君は助っ人にぴったりだ

translation.en: See you lovebirds in 24 hours.
translation.ja: では24時間後に

translation.en: [Pie Maker] I'll take both your eyes for that!
translation.ja: 次は両眼をもらうわ

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -Whoa, hey!
translation.ja: 気をつけろ

translation.en: Gotta catch my breath.
translation.ja: 少し休もう

translation.en: -You said it. -[screams]
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Did you just talk?
translation.ja: しゃべった？

translation.en: Hey, thanks for saving my bacon, man. She is awful.
translation.ja: 助かったよ ひどい婆(ばあ)さんだ食べ物もくれない

translation.en: She has a place full of food, never gives me a crumb.
translation.ja: ひどい婆(ばあ)さんだ食べ物もくれない

translation.en: So, you smell magic and talk.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)をかぎ分けられて話せるのか

translation.en: Any other tricks I should know about? You turn into a car or something?
translation.ja: 他のスキルは？車に変身できる？

translation.en: Oh, you done it now. How did you know I turn into a car?
translation.ja: すごいななんで分かった？

translation.en: I'm just playing. I can't turn into a car. That'd be stupid.
translation.ja: 冗談(じょうだん)だよ 車に変身なんてしない

translation.en: You're stupid. Aw, it's a little bit endearing, though.
translation.ja: 君 ヌケてるけど親しみやすいね

translation.en: Well, thanks again, I owe you.
translation.ja: 借りは返すよ

translation.en: All right. I'm out. Peace.
translation.ja: またな　ピース！

translation.en: Throwing up a, "Peace, I'm out" sign, you just can't tell 'cause I have a hoof.
translation.ja: ピースしたいけどひづめだと見分けがつかない

translation.en: Uh-huh. You do owe me. And I have a way you can repay me right now.
translation.ja: 今が借りを返すチャンスだ

translation.en: I-I-I-I-I'm not going anywhere with any magician ever again.
translation.ja: 悪いけど魔法(まほう)使いとは二度と関わらない

translation.en: Oh, well, you're in luck.
translation.ja: それならよかった

translation.en: I'm not a magician, I'm a Tracker.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はトラッカーだ魔法(まほう)の材料を売ってる

translation.en: -I just sell magical ingredients. -Uh-huh. Cool story, bruh.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はトラッカーだ魔法(まほう)の材料を売ってる あっそう

translation.en: Wait, I know where a Fugu Rose is-- Ish. I don't know exactly where,
translation.ja: フグ･ローズの正確な在りかを突(つ)き止めたい

translation.en: so I need your magic smelling skills to get me to the finish.
translation.ja: 君の鼻の力を貸してくれ

translation.en: Pie Maker wanted to take your eye before you wrecked her shop, what'd you think she's gonna want now? A spleen?
translation.ja: パイメイカーの店を壊(こわ)したら目だけじゃ済まされない

translation.en: Oh, please. She'll be so happy when she gets the Rose, she won't even care.
translation.ja: バラを渡(わた)せば水に流してくれるさ

translation.en: The Rose'll clear all my debts to her, and then some.
translation.ja: 借金が消えて もうけも出る

translation.en: So, you'll walk away. Oh, good for you. What's in it for me?
translation.ja: 君は解放されるけど僕(ぼく)に何のメリットが？

translation.en: If you help me get this Rose,
translation.ja: 手伝ってくれたら

translation.en: I promise I won't give it to her unless she sets you free.
translation.ja: バラを君の自由と引き換(か)えにする

translation.en: Out on my own. Love it. What else?
translation.ja: 自由は最高　他には？

translation.en: We can get pizza on the way.
translation.ja: ピザを食べよう

translation.en: [chuckling] Yes, I am very in.
translation.ja: いいね　気に入ったよ

translation.en: Here, just hoof-pump it, bruh.
translation.ja: ひづめにタッチだ

translation.en: What do I call you anyways? Piggy?
translation.ja: あだ名はピギーでいい？

translation.en: Oh, I get it. "Piggy." Because I'm a pig. Because all pigs look alike to you.
translation.ja: それは僕(ぼく)がブタでどのブタも姿が似てるから？

translation.en: My name is Hoagie. Not "Pig," not "Piggy," not "Oinkie," just "Hoagie."
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はホーギーだ ピギーでもブーブーでもない

translation.en: Hoagie, I was kidding.
translation.ja: なあ 冗談(じょうだん)だよ

translation.en: [Hoagie] Just for that "Piggy" crack, I'm gonna pick the pizza.
translation.ja: 今のは許してやるからピザを選ばせろ

translation.en: [Daniel, munching] Oh!
translation.ja: 〝オルブライト･ワールドワイド社〞

translation.en: Good call on the veggie pizza.
translation.ja: 〝オルブライト･ワールドワイド社〞 野菜ピザはウマいな

translation.en: Yeah, I don't know what it is, but I just don't feel right eating pepperoni anymore.
translation.ja: ああ ペパロニは食べちゃいけない気がした

translation.en: What's the deal with this Albright place?
translation.ja: 〝立ち入り禁止〞 なぜ ここに？

translation.en: I've tracked the Fugu Rose for a long time. The search led me here.
translation.ja: バラを追ってここに たどり着いた

translation.en: A soap factory.
translation.ja: 石けん工場？

translation.en: It's more than a soap factory. I've snuck a bunch of times. It's in there. Somewhere.
translation.ja: ただの工場じゃないバラは この中にある

translation.en: How do you know that? You don't have my nose for this.
translation.ja: 君の鼻で どうして分かる？

translation.en: It's called planning, dummy.
translation.ja: 調査したからさ

translation.en: Oh, look at me.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)もやる

translation.en: I got my hands so I can type and Wiki stuff and think I'm sooo great.
translation.ja: キーボードも打てるし調べ物もチョ～得意

translation.en: Hoagie, keep quiet and stay loose.
translation.ja: 黙(だま)って力を抜(ぬ)け

translation.en: Loose? What do you mean?
translation.ja: 力を？ どうして？

translation.en: Whoa, dude, that is not cool. I'm already down an eye, you trying to break a leg too?
translation.ja: 何する　片目がないのに脚(あし)まで失うところだった

translation.en: [Daniel sighs] I did say stay loose.
translation.ja: 力は抜(ぬ)いた？

translation.en: [Hoagie] So sorry, I haven't exactly been keeping up with my yoga.
translation.ja: 悪いけどヨガは得意じゃない

translation.en: There's magic all over the place in here,
translation.ja: そこらじゅうに魔法(まほう)がある

translation.en: but I'm getting one really strong scent.
translation.ja: でも強烈(きょうれつ)な香りが１つ

translation.en: [Daniel] I knew it. It's this lab, right?
translation.ja: やっぱり　研究室か 〝危険　入場禁止〞 〝危険　入場禁止〞

translation.en: No, the strongest whiff of magic is…
translation.ja: 違(ちが)う　魔法(まほう)の強い香りは…

translation.en: There! Ta-da!
translation.ja: ここだ じゃ～ん

translation.en: Oh, great, you're defective. I literally just fed you.
translation.ja: マジかよさっきピザを食べただろ

translation.en: Ha-ha. Because I'm a pig. Because pigs love to eat.
translation.ja: 笑える　ブタは食べ物が好きだしな

translation.en: The alchemist triad? Bingo.
translation.ja: 錬金術(れんきんじゅつ)の文字 当たり

translation.en: I wonder what it could be.
translation.ja: 組み合わせは…

translation.en: Not that one either.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: Are you sure you did it right?
translation.ja: 正しく押(お)したのか？

translation.en: Uh… I don't even think there's any kind of magic in here.
translation.ja: ここに魔法(まほう)はない

translation.en: This is nothing but a dusty old vending machine.
translation.ja: ただの自動販売機(はんばいき)だ

translation.en: My nose doesn't lie.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)の鼻は正しい

translation.en: Your nose is just trying to get a free Twinkie.
translation.ja: 菓子(かし)が欲しいんだろ

translation.en: Oh, I see. That's how it's gonna be.
translation.ja: なるほど　そうきたか

translation.en: [Daniel] I'll give 'em credit.
translation.ja: これはすごい

translation.en: This was a great hiding place.
translation.ja: 最高の隠(かく)し場所だ

translation.en: Oh, this room reeks of magic.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)の香りに満ちてる

translation.en: It's itching the inside of my brain.
translation.ja: 脳が刺激(しげき)されてかゆい

translation.en: Get it together, Hoagie. We're on the clock.
translation.ja: 頼(たの)むよ　急いでくれ

translation.en: Only a few hours until my deal runs out.
translation.ja: 約束の時間が近い

translation.en: Hoagie? Where'd you go?
translation.ja: ホーギー？　どこだ？

translation.en: [in evil voice] There is no Hoagie, only King of the Squid People.
translation.ja: ホーギーはいない 私はイカの王だ

translation.en: Do squid things for me.
translation.ja: ひざまずけ

translation.en: Get down off the tentacore.
translation.ja: イカから降りろ

translation.en: Chill. I'm just having a little fun.
translation.ja: 遊んでるだけだ

translation.en: I'll chill when we get the Rose. -Don't touch anything. -Hmm.
translation.ja: バラを探すのが先だ何も触(さわ)るな

translation.en: There's no telling what's magically booby-trapped in here.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)のワナがあるかも

translation.en: [gasps] There it is.
translation.ja: あれだ

translation.en: That's the Fugu Rose? Just grab some flowers and split.
translation.ja: これがフグ･ローズ？早く取って帰ろう

translation.en: This whole place was built around this to protect it.
translation.ja: 建物全体でバラを守ってる

translation.en: Does that give you any idea of how powerful it is?
translation.ja: その強さが分かる？

translation.en: One rose on this bush can be used to extend life by decades,
translation.ja: 寿命(じゅみょう)を延ばすバラは１本だけ

translation.en: but touching any of the others brings instant, painful death.
translation.ja: 他のバラに触(ふ)れたとたん苦しんで死ぬ

translation.en: Oh, I get your plan now. You mistook me for a guinea pig.
translation.ja: なるほど僕(ぼく)を実験台にするつもりか

translation.en: -No, I-- -[squeals]
translation.ja: 別に…

translation.en: [screaming] A little help!
translation.ja: 助けて！

translation.en: Hoagie!
translation.ja: ホーギー

translation.en: This is why you don't touch anything.
translation.ja: だから触(さわ)るなと言ったんだ

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm too young to become pepperoni!
translation.ja: ペパロニになるには若すぎる

translation.en: Immune to stun spells. That's real--
translation.ja: スタンが効かないなんて

translation.en: Score!
translation.ja: あれだ

translation.en: Let's get that rose and get out.
translation.ja: バラを探せ

translation.en: Heaven help me, it tastes so good!
translation.ja: ウソみたいだ めちゃウマい

translation.en: -Hoagie… get me… the sword… now. -[thumping]
translation.ja: ホーギー あの 剣(けん)を 取って くれ

translation.en: -[thumping continues] -This… genuinely… hurts.
translation.ja: これ マジで 痛い！

translation.en: [Hoagie] I've got the sword!
translation.ja: 剣(けん)だよ

translation.en: Daniel! You want me? Come and get me, land sushi.
translation.ja: 大変だ 僕(ぼく)が相手になる　スシになれ

translation.en: Oh, man, did you just touch that rose?
translation.ja: あのバラに触(さわ)っちゃった？

translation.en: Oh, I bet you're feeling stupid now.
translation.ja: マヌケな気分だろうね

translation.en: Daniel! Tell me you're okay.
translation.ja: ダニエル　大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)？

translation.en: Didn't I say not to touch anything?! You almost got me killed!
translation.ja: だから触(さわ)るなと言ったんだ君のせいで死にかけた

translation.en: No, I saved you.
translation.ja: いいや　君を助けた

translation.en: From a thing you brought to life with your touching!
translation.ja: イカに命が宿ったのは触(さわ)ったからだ

translation.en: Now I'm drenched in walking fish guts.
translation.ja: 内臓まみれになった

translation.en: -Pfft. You're still alive. -[sighs]
translation.ja: でも生きてる

translation.en: You want this rose or not? Because I know which one to definitely not touch.
translation.ja: それに正解のバラは僕(ぼく)にしか分からない

translation.en: Tell me the right one to pick.
translation.ja: 本物はどれ？

translation.en: I'm trying. I'm a little fired up right now.
translation.ja: 教えたいけどまだ動揺(どうよう)してる

translation.en: I'm not used to facing death so many times in one day.
translation.ja: １日に何度も死にかけた

translation.en: Yes! Best Tracker alive.
translation.ja: やった！最高のトラッカーだ

translation.en: Man, I was like 65% sure I was right. Thank goodness.
translation.ja: 確信は65％だったけど合っててよかった

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: Uh, those were decent odds. Just take the victory lap and be happy.
translation.ja: いい確率だろ　勝利を喜べ

translation.en: Come on, I got you.
translation.ja: 受け止める

translation.en: Alley-oop.
translation.ja: ほらよっと

translation.en: -Thanks. -Good work, man.
translation.ja: 助かった よかったら僕(ぼく)と組まない？

translation.en: What do you think about hanging around?
translation.ja: よかったら僕(ぼく)と組まない？

translation.en: We make an okay team, yeah?
translation.ja: いいチームになる

translation.en: Oh, so I can help you make money off of my power. What an offer.
translation.ja: 君が稼(かせ)ぐために協力しろと？

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
translation.ja: どこに行く？

translation.en: You're a magic talking pig. The normal world won't know what to do with you.
translation.ja: 表の世界に魔法(まほう)のブタの居場所はない

translation.en: Thanks. I'll take my chances.
translation.ja: それでもやってみる

translation.en: Lots of better jobs out there for a pig than being your nose servant.
translation.ja: 誰(だれ)かの手下でいるよりマシだ

translation.en: Hoagie, you're right. We can make money.
translation.ja: 確かに　なら２人で稼(かせ)ごう

translation.en: Together. Split it 50/50.
translation.ja: もうけは平等に分配して——

translation.en: Watch each other's backs. What'd you say?
translation.ja: ２人で助け合うんだ

translation.en: Now you're talking. All right. I'm in.
translation.ja: そういうことならノッた

translation.en: Dowsers. Run for it!
translation.ja: オフィサーだ　逃(に)げろ

translation.en: I swear I never touched anything.
translation.ja: 何も触(さわ)ってないよ

translation.en: [female dowser] By order of the Bureau of Magical Enforcement, you are both under arrest.
translation.ja: 魔法(まほう)警察の命令によりあなたたちを逮捕(たいほ)する

translation.en: I do not know this guy. We are not together.
translation.ja: この人のことは知らないよ仲間じゃない

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: どうも
